member.name: T:Windows.Networking.NetworkOperators.FdnAccessManager
member.summary: Manages access to the Fixed Dialing Number (FDN) list.

member.name: M:Windows.Networking.NetworkOperators.FdnAccessManager.RequestUnlockAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Static method that prompts the user for the PIN required to change a contact list of Fixed Dialing Numbers (FDNs). Typically your code calls this method when planning to make a change to the contact list. If the return value on successful completion is **true**, then you will be able to change the list of FDN contacts.
member.param: A ContactList ID for the contact list you wish to change.
member.returns: An asynchronous retrieval operation. On successful completion, contains a Boolean value representing whether the PIN was entered successfully.
